description: Detects potential evasion or obfuscation attempts using bogus path traversal via the commandline
author: Christian Burkard (Nextron Systems)
name: Potential Command Line Path Traversal Evasion Attempt
query: ((((process.executable.text:"*\\Windows\\*" AND process.command_line.text:("*\\..\\Windows\\*" OR "*\\..\\System32\\*" OR "*\\..\\..\\*"))) OR (process.command_line.text:"*.exe\\..\\*")) AND (NOT ((process.command_line.text:"*\\Google\\Drive\\googledrivesync.exe\\..\\*") OR (process.command_line.text:"*\\Citrix\\Virtual\ Smart\ Card\\Citrix.Authentication.VirtualSmartcard.Launcher.exe\\..\\*"))))
